title: Purple Ladybug Glitter Tattoos for Kids - Includes 9 Colors, 175 Safe Temporary Tattoos Design - DIY Arts and Crafts Gift for Girls Aged 5-12 - Girls Birthday Presents
features: All-in-one glitter tattoo kit: This complete set includes 9 vibrant glitter colors, 175 different tattoo designs, and application brushes - everything kids need for hours of creative, sparkly fun at home, parties, or on the go.

Easy to Apply: Our temporary tattoos for kids are practical: no glue, no water, no messy stencils, all FUN! You pick the design and the colours you want it to appear - even multiple colours on the same tattoo!
Safe for sensitive skin: Made with hypoallergenic materials that are gentle on children’s skin. Tattoos are easy to apply and remove without irritation - perfect use by kids aged 5 and up.
Creative fun for girls: A great gift for girls who love crafts and fashion. Encourages self-expression, artistic exploration, and DIY creativity while boosting confidence and hand-eye coordination.

Ideal for parties & events: This tattoo set is perfect for birthdays, Christmas gifts for kids, Easter gifts, party favors, school events, or playdates. Kids will love designing glittery tattoos that last 3-7 days and wash off easily when ready.

Perfect gift for kids ages 5-12: Whether it's for Christmas, birthdays, or just a weekend activity, this fun arts and crafts kit makes an exciting and memorable gift that girls will enjoy creating and sharing with friends.

Together Time: Enjoy quality time with your child. Take a break from screens and electronics. Nurture creativity and self-expression and enhance fine motor skills during your next family activity time!
